metadata.name: PUA - AdvancedRun Suspicious Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of AdvancedRun utility in the context of the TrustedInstaller, SYSTEM, Local Service or Network Service accounts

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/exefilename')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/commandline'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /runas 8 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /runas 4 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /runas 10 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /runas 11 '))) AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/runas 8')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/runas 4')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/runas 10')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/runas 11'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of AdvancedRun utility in the context of the TrustedInstaller, SYSTEM, Local Service or Network Service accounts
